lines.text: We have a witness, who saw you crawl out of your car and over to the victim's car, what were you doing? Pissing on the hubcaps?
I just wanted to beat my meat!
You're gonna run your business from the slammer before long, if you don't shut up!
Yeah? Well you either charge me, lock me up and get off of my back- or let me go, because I don't care if half the goddamn valley gets chopped up! Now what are you gonna do?

[pause]
Get... outta... here!

[watching a cop at the police station eating a ham sandwich]
You better watch it, you might be eating your father.

[mumbling to himself]
Goddamn... what a bunch of crap... a bunch of degenerates.
I talked to the manager of the drive in, his name is Austin Johnson, and you're really gonna like him. He's what you'd call your perfect asshole.
My name is Garmey, but my friends call me Germy.
Do you have many friends Germy?
Leedo and Hobo. They were the elephants at the carnival...
[sadly]
but they're all gone now.
Let's go get that bald-headed garbage can!

[refering to the owner of the drive-in theater]
Van Hewson thinks I married this "toilet"!
They may have closed the carnival, but the freaks are still hanging around and we just talked to two of the choicest ones.

[Dressed in womens' clothing]
Kiss me you fool.
Get away from me, you idiot.
[Muffled dialogue and incidental chatter]

[groans]
Anything for my pension and welfare.
You stay in your side of the car.
I got married for only two hours and you do not want anything to do with me!
Well, it could be your bad breath!
You really want to talk to this piece of puke?
[last lines]

[voice]
Ladies and gentlemen, this is the manager. Do not panic. There is a murderer loose in the theater. I repeat, do not panic. The police are on the way.
